meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasant or agreeable in character.
meanings.sent1: Her likablenesses made everyone enjoy her company.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's likablenesses made it a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent3: The likablenesses of the kitten were so charming that it was impossible not to smile.
meanings.sent4: His likablenesses shone through even in the most challenging situations.
meanings.sent5: The likablenesses of the old bookstore created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being liked or admired by others.
meanings.sent1: The likablenesses of the celebrity attracted a large following.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the sudden increase in her likablenesses after the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The likablenesses of the cake were evident from the way it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: His likablenesses in the community made him a natural leader.
meanings.sent5: The likablenesses of the painting captured the hearts of all who saw it.
